head.title: The Netlify Platform
head.desc: Everything needed for modern web development from local setup, to global deployment

list1.title: Netlify Dev
list1.desc: Run our entire platform right on your laptop.
list1.desc2: Preview it all — site generation, functions, and edge logic.

list2.title: Netlify Build
list2.desc: The Git workflow for web development.
list2.desc2: Build, deploy, and manage modern web projects.

list3.title: Netlify Edge
list3.desc: A new type of application delivery network custom
list3.desc2: designed for blazing fast sites and modern workflows.

section2.title: Powerful add-ons
section2.desc: Say hello to your new superpowers – no backend servers needed.

lists.title: Functions
lists.subtitle: Deploy AWS Lambda functions without configuring API gateways, coordinating deployments, or setting up an AWS account.
lists.desc: Your functions are version-controlled, built, and deployed along with the rest of your Netlify site, and the Netlify API gateway automatically handles service discovery. Plus, your functions benefit from the power of Deploy Previews and rollbacks.

lists.title: Identity
lists.subtitle: Manage signups, logins, password recovery, and more — all without rolling your own authentication service.
lists.desc: Register and authenticate visitors to your site so you can gate content, enable CMS functionality, make authenticated calls to outside services, and more. Securely integrate with any service that understands JSON Web Tokens.

lists.title: Forms
lists.subtitle: Manage forms and submissions without any server-side code or JavaScript.
lists.desc: Code an HTML form into any page on your site, add a netlify attribute to the <form> tag, and you’ll receive submissions in your Netlify dashboard. HTML files are parsed directly at deploy time, so there’s no need for you to make an API call or include extra JavaScript on your site.

lists.title: Large Media
lists.subtitle: Manage binary files of any size right in your repo, just like code.
lists.desc: Netlify Large Media makes it easy to handle larger assets from the first Git check in through to final delivery. Version control files many gigabytes in size and dynamically resize images on the fly as they are served.

section3.title: Wow, right out of the box
section3.desc: Whether you’re having a facepalm moment or you just need to ship your 404 page, Netlify’s automated workflow makes the hard stuff simple.

section4.title: Netlify makes it simple
section4.desc: You shouldn’t have to be an architecture expert to build and deploy a feature-rich site.

list1.title: Push your site live
list1.desc: Deploy your site to an ultra-redundant global Application Delivery Network that’s purpose built for serving pages and assets quickly and consistently.

list2.title: Automate deployment
list2.desc: Netlify’s built-in continuous deployment automatically runs your build commands and deploys the result whenever you push to your Git repository.

list3.title: Add a custom domain
list3.desc: Buy a custom domain through Netlify or add a domain you already own. Manage DNS zones and records using Netlify’s DNS hosting.

list4.title: HTTPS is automatic
list4.desc: Your site will automatically be secured with a free TLS certificate from Let’s Encrypt. (No clicks necessary.)

list5.title: Preview your changes
list5.desc: See what changes will look like in production using Deploy Previews. Get a unique, permanent URL whenever you submit a pull request. It’s posted as a commit status for easy collaboration.

section5.title: Ready to put the robots to work?
section5.desc: Take your site to the next level with sophisticated, API-driven functionality. We’ll take care of all the complicated server setup and integration.

section6.title: Bring your favorite tools
section6.desc: Whether you’re creating your own customizations, extending your workflow with open source projects, or integrating best-in-class microservices, Netlify’s highly-extensible APIs let you add as little or as much tooling as you need.
